code: var CommonUtils={stringToPascalCase:function stringToPascalCase(text){return text.replace(/(\w)(\w*)/g,function(g0,g1,g2){return g1.toUpperCase()+g2.toLowerCase();});},formatNumber:function formatNumber(x){return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g,".");}};export default CommonUtils;
